internships.project: Code Compliance & Static Analysis using Clang/LLVM
highlights: Designed and implemented custom Clang/LLVM analysis passes to identify non-compliant and inefficient C/C++ code patterns
Leveraged Clang AST matchers and Clang-Tidy checks to enforce coding standards
Performed benchmarking and performance evaluation of compiler passes across multiple codebases

internships.project: Aesthetic Image Enhancement & Green Spill Removal
highlights: Conducted research on DSLR image enhancement to improve visual quality, color balance, and contrast
Implemented and evaluated multiple green spill removal algorithms for green screen backgrounds
Applied color space transformations (RGB, HSV, LAB) to suppress color spill while preserving natural edges
Compared algorithm performance based on visual quality, artifact reduction, and computational efficiency
